## Principles
- Explicit parameters for every step
- Logged provenance (seed, sessionInfo, checksums)
- Reproducible outputs

## Planned pipeline
1. Read corpus (UCI + `*etoile` variables)
2. Clean + tokenize
3. Segment into UCEs
4. Lemmatize (IRaMuTeQ lexique, when provided)
5. Build sparse matrices and lexical tables
6. Run analyses and export artifacts
